name: M&M's Break 'Em
overview: Mr. Runch, a rotten and dangerous peanut, fiercely determined on being one of the M&M's, just escaped the reject bin where he was discarded as ghastly! He's on the loose in the Galaxy, and trying to kidnap and trap all of the M&M's into crystals until he can get what he wants: the chance to become a real M&M's candy!
